statements: SELECT * FROM network_configuration_changes;
SELECT change_id, change_date, user_id, change_description FROM network_configuration_changes;
SELECT user_id, change_date, change_description, change_id FROM network_configuration_changes;
SELECT change_description, user_id FROM network_configuration_changes;
SELECT change_id, user_id, change_date FROM network_configuration_changes;
SELECT * FROM network_configuration_changes WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT change_id, user_id, change_description FROM network_configuration_changes WHERE change_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS change_count FROM network_configuration_changes GROUP BY user_id HAVING change_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM network_configuration_changes WHERE change_description LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY change_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM network_configuration_changes;
SELECT * FROM network_configuration_changes;
SELECT id, change_date, change_description FROM network_configuration_changes ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT change_description FROM network_configuration_changes WHERE id = 5;
SELECT log_id, log_date, action_performed FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_configuration_changes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT change_description, change_date FROM network_configuration_changes ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 3 AND action_performed LIKE '%update%' ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_logs FROM audit_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_logs > 5;
SELECT log_id, action_performed, log_date FROM audit_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY log_date DESC;

SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin'

SELECT username, email, role FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'j%' AND role = 'user';

SELECT user_id, full_name FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE device_type='router';
SELECT change_id, user_id, description FROM network_configuration_changes ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action, user_id FROM audit_logs WHERE action='login' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email IS NOT NULL;

SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT change_id, change_date, change_description FROM network_configuration_changes WHERE change_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT u.username, d.device_name, dc.config_date FROM users u JOIN network_devices d ON u.user_id = d.device_id JOIN device_configurations dc ON d.device_id = dc.device_id;
